item.title: Decisions, from "Sophie's Choice"" with Meryl Streep
item.description: “Sophie’s Choice” (directed by Alan J. Pakula) In a from the movie “Sophie’s Choice,” ) a Nazi officer at a concentration camp demands that a holocaust prisoner, played by Meryl Streep, decide which of the two young children at her side will live and which will be snatched away. The scene is excruciating. Everyone, especially parents, cringes – no, they cry inside at the pathological cruelty of this monstrous decision forced on a mother.
